mapper.sql: id, supplier_side_id, demand_id, work, meet_time, address, contact, respectful_name, phone_area_code, telephone_number, extension_number, mobile_number, status, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into sign_up_meet (id, supplier_side_id, demand_id, work, meet_time, address, contact, respectful_name, phone_area_code, telephone_number, extension_number, mobile_number, status, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierSideId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respectfulName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phoneAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephoneNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{extensionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into sign_up_meet
id,
supplier_side_id,
demand_id,
work,
meet_time,
address,
contact,
respectful_name,
phone_area_code,
telephone_number,
extension_number,
mobile_number,
status,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierSideId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{demandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{meetTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sign_up_meet
supplier_side_id = #{supplierSideId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
demand_id = #{demandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work = #{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meet_time = #{meetTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
respectful_name = #{respectfulName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone_area_code = #{phoneAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone_number = #{telephoneNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
extension_number = #{extensionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_number = #{mobileNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sign_up_meet set supplier_side_id = #{supplierSideId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, demand_id = #{demandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work = #{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meet_time = #{meetTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, respectful_name = #{respectfulName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_area_code = #{phoneAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone_number = #{telephoneNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extension_number = #{extensionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sum(cnt) from ( select count(1) cnt from sign_up_meet sum, demand where sum.supplier_side_id = #{supplierId} and sum.demand_id = demand.id union select count(1) cnt from sign_up_meet_history sumh, demand where sumh.supplier_side_id = #{supplierId} and sumh.demand_id = demand.id and sumh.status in (2,3) ) cnt

select * from ( select demand.id, demand.name, demand.begin_cycle, demand.end_cycle, demand.demand_discribe, sum.`work` sign_up_work, GROUP_CONCAT(dep.work) work, sum(dep.persons_amount) persons_amount, sum.meet_time, sum.status from sign_up_meet sum, demand, demand_employ_persons dep where demand.id = sum.demand_id and demand.id = dep.demand_id and sum.supplier_side_id = #{supplierId} group by dep.work union select demand.id, demand.name, demand.begin_cycle, demand.end_cycle, demand.demand_discribe, sumh.`work` sign_up_work, GROUP_CONCAT(dep.work) work, sum(dep.persons_amount) persons_amount, sumh.meet_time, sumh.status from sign_up_meet_history sumh, demand, demand_employ_persons dep where demand.id = sumh.demand_id and demand.id = dep.demand_id and sumh.supplier_side_id = #{supplierId} group by dep.work ) unionTB order by meet_time desc limit ${page.start}, ${page.pageSize}

select id, sign_up_work, meet_time, nick_name, head_portrait, working_years, expect_pay, status from ( select demand.id,sum.`work` sign_up_work, sum.meet_time meet_time, ss.nick_name, ss.head_portrait, ss.working_years, resume.expect_pay,sum.status from sign_up_meet sum, demand, supplier_side ss, resume where sum.supplier_side_id = ss.id and sum.demand_id = #{demandId} and sum.demand_id = demand.id and demand.demand_side_id = #{demandSideId} and ss.id = resume.supplier_side_id union select demand.id,sums.`work` sign_up_work, sums.meet_time meet_time, ss.nick_name, ss.head_portrait, ss.working_years, resume.expect_pay,sums.status from sign_up_meet_history sums, demand, supplier_side ss, resume where sums.supplier_side_id = ss.id and sums.demand_id = #{demandId} and sums.demand_id = demand.id and demand.demand_side_id = #{demandSideId} and ss.id = resume.supplier_side_id ) unionTB order by meet_time desc limit ${page.start}, ${page.pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into sign_up_meet_history (select * from sign_up_meet where id = #{id})
